name: Accurate Shot
description:
Accurate Shot is a 3D adventure game with a first-person perspective. You are a young traveler who has decided to become an archer, your task is to pass the entrance exam and prove to everyone that you are the best shooter!

Stretch the bowstring, aim and shoot! Control the arrow and hit all the targets on your way! Many exciting levels of varying difficulty await you! Whether you can pass this test is up to you!

You have to make quick tactical decisions and destroy targets with a precise shot! Use your bow and arrows and show off your lightning-fast reactions! Use your care and creativity to move forward, otherwise you'll have to start all over again! Develop your skills through mistakes and careful training and become the greatest archer!

Game Features:
- First person archer simulator with incredible bow mechanics.
- In the game you have to plan every shot
- Lots of levels
